example: Again -- this time, sycamore -- wind- dispersed .
example_meaning: Lần này là cây sung dâu, phân tán nhờ gió.
definition: Simple past tense and past participle ofdisperse.

example: """How can we economize when we have nothing?''"
example_meaning: “Làm sao chúng ta có thể tiết kiệm khi không có gì cả?”
definition: To practice being economical (by using things sparingly or in moderation, and by avoiding waste or extravagance).

example: Concepts of morality are disengaged .
example_meaning: Bó buộc về đạo đức sẽ được cởi bỏ.
definition: (fencing) A circular movement of the blade that avoids the opponent's parry

example: Baklava is normally prepared in large pans.
example_meaning: Baklava thường được chế biến trên chảo lớn.
definition: A popular sweet pastry found in many cuisines of the Middle East and the Balkans, made of chopped nuts layered with phyllo pastry.

example: Our patience is in much the same condition as yesterday.
example_meaning: Sự kiên nhẫn của chúng tôi cũng trong tình trạng như hôm qua.
definition: The quality of being patient.

example: Diversity within the various kinds of vegetables grown in the United States has been slashed by 97 percent in less than 80 years!
example_meaning: Tính đa dạng của các loại rau cải mọc ở Hoa Kỳ đã giảm hẳn 97 phần trăm trong không đầy 80 năm!
definition: (of a plant) To grow or sprout.

example: Choose uplifting entertainment.
example_meaning: Hãy chọn thú giải trí mà nâng cao tinh thần .
definition: Improving the mood; causing cheerfulness.

example: SANDRA, a woman in Mexico, described herself as the black sheep of her family.
example_meaning: SANDRA, một phụ nữ ở Mexico, đã xem mình là con chiên ghẻ của gia đình.
definition: Used other than as an idiom:seeblack,sheep.

example: You're a cash cow on the corner.
example_meaning: Kiếm bộn tiền ngoài phố đấy.
definition: (idiomatic, business) A product, service, or enterprise that generates ongoing, high net free cash flows.

example: A fine horse still makes a costly and cherished gift .
example_meaning: Một chú ngựa khỏe vẫn được coi là món quà quý giá và đắt đỏ.
definition: (idiomatic) An apparent gift, that has substantial associated costs.

example: No horsing around !
example_meaning: Đừng có la cà !
definition: (idiomatic) To play or fiddle; to clown; to do nothing of importance or consequence.

word: let the cat out of the bag
example: Or when someone lets the cat out of the bag ?
example_meaning: Hay ai đó lỡ miệng nói điều gì kích động?
definition: (idiomatic) To disclose a secret; to let a secret be known, often inadvertently.

example: " Monkey Wrapped Around a Tree ".
example_meaning: " Khỉ Ôm Cây. "
definition: (idiomatic) To act foolishly.

example: Enough monkey business .
example_meaning: Có đủ trò khỉ rồi.
definition: (US, slang) Wasting time, or effort, on some foolish project.

example: Playing possum is what we do.
example_meaning: Giả chết là điều chúng ta có thể làm.
definition: (idiomatic) to feign death; to remain quiet and still to escape attention or remain undetected; to lay low.

example: Yes, I was outside and it's raining cats and dogs .
example_meaning: Phải, tôi đã ở bên ngoài và trời đang mưa như trút nước.
definition: (idiomatic) To rain very heavily.

example: Why run this rat race ?
example_meaning: Tại sao chúng ta phải tranh đấu vất vả như thế?
definition: (idiomatic, singular only) An activity or situation which is congested with participants and which is hectic or tedious, especially in the context of a busy, modern urban lifestyle.

example: Her red hair is considered her trademark.
example_meaning: Mái tóc đỏ được coi là một thương hiệu của cô.
definition: A smoke-cured and salt-brined herring strong enough to turn the flesh red; a type of kipper.

example: Road hog !
example_meaning: Lợn lái xe !
definition: A motorist who straddles two lanes of traffic or otherwise monopolizes the road.

example: As if it were a sacred cow !
example_meaning: Cứ như thể nó là một con bò thiêng!
definition: (idiomatic) Something which cannot be tampered with, or criticized, for fear of public outcry. A person, institution, belief system, etc. which, for no reason other than the demands of established social etiquette or popular opinion, should be accorded respect or reverence, and not touched, handled or examined too closely.

example: The human being is called a " couch potato . "
example_meaning: Họ được gọi là những kẻ nghiện tivi .
definition: A person who spends a lot of time sitting or lying down, often watching television, eating snacks or drinking alcohol.

example: Their physical condition changed as a result of their eating the forbidden fruit .
example_meaning: Tình trạng thể chất của họ thay đổi do việc họ ăn trái cấm .
definition: The fruit forbidden to Adam.

example: Good egg .
example_meaning: Hết xẩy !
definition: (idiomatic) A good person, someone to be trusted; a friend.

example: In a nutshell , a Siftable is an interactive computer
example_meaning: Nói ngắn gọn , Siftables là một máy tính tác động lẫn nhau
definition: (idiomatic) In summary; briefly or simply.

example: It is half baked .
example_meaning: Phiên bản này hiện đang trong quá trình hoàn thiện .
definition: Used other than as an idiom: Partially cooked by heating in an oven.

example: Piece of cake
example_meaning: Dễ thôi mà!
definition: Used other than as an idiom:seepiece,cake.

example: It's on the table .
example_meaning: Rượu ở trên bàn .
definition: on the table (desk)

example: Most monetarists oppose the gold standard .
example_meaning: Hầu hết trường phái trọng tiền phản đối bản vị vàng .
definition: (economics) A monetary system where the value of circulating money is linked to the value of gold.

example: 5 After the Exodus from Egypt, Moses sent 12 spies into the Promised Land .
example_meaning: 5 Sau khi ra khỏi Ê-díp-tô, Môi-se phái 12 người đi do thám Đất Hứa .
definition: Alternative form of [i]Promised Land[/i]

example: Rain check ?
example_meaning: Để sau nhé ?
definition: (idiomatic) Any voucher or note from a merchant to a customer to provide an item the merchant has run out of at a later date for the item's current price, or (in a more literal sense) to provide a service at a later date.

example: " Jet Set " playback take 1.
example_meaning: " Jet - Set " phát lần 1.
definition: (idiomatic) A set of wealthy people who travel for pleasure

example: In this job, my pet peeve is.
example_meaning: Làm nghề này anh mày ghét nhất
definition: Something that is personally annoying; a personal dislike.

example: Some sort of rite of passage ?
example_meaning: Nghi thức trưởng thành ?
definition: (anthropology) a ceremony or series of ceremonies, often very ritualized, to celebrate a transition in a person’s life. Baptisms, bar mitzvahs, weddings and funerals are among the best known examples.

example: This is the last straw .
example_meaning: Đây là giọt nước cuối cùng làm tràn ly .
definition: (slang) A small addition to a burden which causes it to exceed the capacity.

example: This deliberate irony is an example of doublespeak , when words are used not to convey meaning but to undermine it, corrupting the very ideas they refer to.
example_meaning: Sự mỉa mai cố ý này là một ví dụ của lối nói " doublespeak" khi ngôn ngữ không được dùng để truyền tải ý nghĩa đích thực của nó mà bị bóp méo khiến thay đổi sắc thái và ngữ nghĩa câu văn để lừa bịp người khác.
definition: Any language deliberately constructed to disguise or distort its actual meaning, often by employing euphemism or ambiguity. Typically used by governments or large institutions.

example: Blue - bloods ?
example_meaning: Máu - Xanh ?
definition: (uncountable) noble or aristocratic ancestry

example: Body and soul .
example_meaning: Linh hồn và thể xác .
definition: with complete faith; "she was with him heart and soul"

example: Yet suddenly giving people the cold shoulder .
example_meaning: Tuy vậy, đột nhiên đem lại cho người lạnh vai.
definition: (idiomatic) A deliberate act of disrespect; a slight or snub
